CustomField.description: MIY-659 : Set 1 to FirmOrder which are stuck more than 3 days in SF so not retrieved by JDE integration. This field is used by NY Global follow-up Dashboard and relying reports to pro-actively alert about FO at risk to Business leader (Michael Giraud) and AMS Team (EcoCea, CGI)
CustomField.formula: IF( ((TEXT(SPO_BriefName__r.ApplicationSource__c) ='SPO' && SPO_BriefName__r.SPO_Date_Creation_in_progress__c < TODAY()-3 && NOT(ISBLANK(SPO_BriefName__r.SPO_SpecialOrderSKUCodeRef__c))) || (TEXT(SPO_BriefName__r.ApplicationSource__c) <>'SPO' && SPO_BriefName__r.CreatedDate < NOW()-3)) && (TEXT(SPO_BriefName__r.StageName) ='Creation in progress' || TEXT(SPO_BriefName__r.StageName) ='In progress') && TEXT(SPO_TechETLStatus__c) <>'Y' ,1 ,0)
CustomField.label: REP_At Risk Not In JDE
